function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of contagion due to the close physical proximity of individuals within the built environment.","Impact":"Potential rapid spread of contagious diseases within the population, leading to a public health crisis and economic disruption.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, social distancing measures, and ventilation systems to reduce the risk of contagion.","Technologies":"Air purification systems, contactless fixtures, smart building management systems.","People":"General population, especially those in urban areas and high-traffic public spaces.","Owner":"Government health departments, building owners and managers, architects and urban planners."}]}
